scripts.buildWeb: cd src/ui && npx ng cache clean && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.buildWebDebug: cd src/ui && npx ng cache clean && npx ng build --configuration development
scripts.buildWebServer: cd src/web && npx ncc build index.mjs -o ../../target/bin/web
scripts.build: npm run buildNet && npm run buildWeb && npm run buildWebServer
scripts.dev: npm run buildNetDebug && npm run buildWebDebug
